text.section:
The Corporation is exempt from:
Title 10 and Division II of the State Finance and Procurement Article;
laws governing the State Personnel Management System under Division I of the State Personnel and Pensions Article; and
Article 31, §§ 9, 10, and 11 of the Code (Conditions upon Sale of Public Securities).

section.section: The Corporation is subject to the Public Information Act.
The Corporation is exempt from the Open Meetings Act.

text.section: The Board and employees of the Corporation are subject to the Public Ethics Law.
